title: Tadako Yoko
author: Tadako Yoko
content: Hello All,As founders with a proven track record in the space, we're currently working on a new project and seeking an experienced Campaign Manager manager.Please share your Telegram link or PM me.Best regards.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Hi Tadako YokoWelcome to BitcointalkIt would be good to provide more details about your projects and goals from the marketing campaign. Campaign managers will need this information to decide whether or not they want to reach out to work with you. I believe that this information can be publicly available and there is no need for private communication.In general, if you are looking for a campaign manager, it is best to contact him yourself, and I can assure you from my website that there are many reliable and good campaign managers whose integrity you can verify by checking the history of their activity.I can recommend that you contact Royse777, who is considered one of the best campaign managers currently. Here are some useful links to contact him:Profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=366632Portfolio:  Bitcointalk Campaign ManagementÂ  Signature & BountyTelegram contact: https://t.me/royse777Wish you the best of luck.Regards

comments.author: Tadako Yoko
comments.body: Thank you for the info! We are in search of an individual well-versed in leading campaigns, particularly on Bitcointalk.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: OP, take a look at these informative topics about campaign managers offering their services on the forum:[ list] Campaign Management ServicesOverview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers And if you're looking for other services like graphic design or escrow, you can check out this topic:[Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk Members

comments.body: HeyFeel free to DM me here or telegram- @LT_MouseHave been managing campaigns for more than 3 years in Bitcointalk.My portfolio- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5180747.0

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: All of the given links are good lists if you're looking for a campaign manager. But most of those are no longer updated and the one that I'll be suggesting you isn't on that list yet but he's known in the forum and are currently managing a lot of campaigns. He's got no thread for his portfolio but everyone knows him and his reputation. Check icopress' profile to see all of the campaigns he has managed and currently managing.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Hello & Welcome!I am comparatively new if you compare the above application. That doesn't mean I am new to what I can do as a BM. I can help you with the lowest investment ensuring high gains for your project. Please contact me, if you want a fresh mind to promote your project with less investment on a BM and more on promoting your project. My telegram @pakhitheboss, let's connect before you decide to hire a BM for your project.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You can reach out to me via telegram @yahoo62278 or feel free to pm me on here. I will probably not be the cheapest option for your project, but I am damn sure 1 of the best options. Great reputation and great communication, well trusted in the community as well.. If you are looking for the cheapest manager, please don't send me a message.

comments.author: Imranbutt44
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on September 28, 2023, 01:19:29 PMIf you are looking for the cheapest manager, please don't send me a message.If the project has a budget, they should hire an expensive manager.Just like you buy an expensive car to get additional long lasting benefits, investing in an expensive manager pays off for the project in the mid - long run.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: You sound like someone that is looking for potential manager to hire, you can contact @BrainBoss for your campaign manager and you will appreciate for what you will get in return because he is addicted to quality service through out the process to satisfy his customer and you will surely get such benefits from his service.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Tadako Yoko on September 28, 2023, 08:07:13 AMPlease share your Telegram link or PM me.Since you asked :-)Telegram info on the left please.Quote from: Royse777 on April 04, 2021, 06:20:45 PM Â  ACTIVE CAMPAIGN(S) Â  These are only the active campaigns of some already established and popular brands or those on the way to becoming established. I stopped responding in threads because some of the members are too busy criticizing me for whatever reasons they have. When they see that I am trying to have a discussion with a potential client, they start sending cherry-picked comments via Private Messaging to convince the potential client with negativity so that they don't take my service. Well, it doesn't always work, or I wouldn't have so much business.With me, you are going to get the best possible return on your investment. The brands I am working with serve as a reference for this bold statement. You will not regret the decision to work with me if you choose to do so. I look forward to having a discussion so that we can understand each other better.Regardless of whether we work together or not, my best wishes are always for the success of your project.Looking forward. Cheers, If you have doubt and not comfortable with me then you already have two campaign mangers who showed their interest too. Little Mouse and yahoo62278. Both are highly qualified to give you good service. I hope it helps.
